function GetCrisisType (crisisID as integer) as integer dim typeID, refrow as integer
if OnNewCaprica() then refrow = _CapricaRow else refrow = _CrisisRow end if
for typeID = 1 to 5 if CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_CrisisTypeCol + typeID -1, refrow + crisisID).string <> "" then GetCrisisType = typeID exit function end if next typeID GetCrisisType = 0 end function
' This will tell us how many cards are in the crisis deck, based on game options function CrisisCnt as integer dim curcnt as integer
curcnt = _CrisisBaseCnt
if UseCylonFleet() then curcnt = curcnt - _CrisisBaseAttackCnt end if
if GameTypeIsPegasus() then curcnt = curcnt + _CrisisPegasusCnt if UseCylonFleet() then curcnt = curcnt - _CrisisPegasusAttackCnt end if end if
if GameTypeIsExodus() then curcnt = curcnt + _CrisisExodusCnt if UseCylonFleet() then curcnt = curcnt - _CrisisExodusAttackCnt else curcnt = curcnt - _CrisisExodusCAGCnt end if end if
if GameTypeIsDaybreak() then curcnt = curcnt + _CrisisDaybreakCnt if UseCylonFleet() then curcnt = curcnt - _CrisisDaybreakAttackCnt end if end if
if GameTypeIsRevelations() then curcnt = curcnt + _CrisisRevelationsCnt end if
CrisisCnt = curcnt end function 'CrisisCnt
' This will tell us how many cards are in the Super Crisis deck, based on game options function SuperCrisisCnt as integer dim curcnt as integer
curcnt = _SuperBaseCnt
if UseCylonFleet() then curcnt = curcnt - _SuperBaseAttackCnt end if
if GameTypeIsPegasus() then curcnt = curcnt + _SuperPegasusCnt if UseCylonFleet() then curcnt = curcnt - _SuperPegasusAttackCnt end if end if
if GameTypeIsExodus() then curcnt = curcnt + _SuperExodusCnt if UseCylonFleet() then curcnt = curcnt - _SuperExodusAttackCnt else curcnt = curcnt - _SuperExodusCAGCnt end if end if
if GameTypeIsRevelations() then curcnt = curcnt + _SuperRevelationsCnt end if
SuperCrisisCnt = curcnt end function 'SuperCrisisCnt

'shipstrings are of the form: ' #x[#|\[#,#[,#]\][,#x[#|\[#,#[,#]\]] ' ' this will return an array of integers which are the sectors in which to deploy the ship ' 1x3,2x4 will be come (3,4,4)
' Note: the Scar crisis has the raider deployment removed and Scar is explicitly deployed as part of PlayCrisisCard
function ParseShipString (shipstr as string) as variant dim shipdep() as integer dim i, shiptot, shipcount, sector as integer
shiptot = 0
do while len(shipstr) > 0 if left(shipstr,1)="," then shipstr=mid(shipstr,2) end if shipcount = val(left(shipstr,1)) shipstr = mid(shipstr,3) if left(shipstr,1) = "[" then shipstr=mid(shipstr,2) 'multiple sectors do while left(shipstr,1) <> "]" sector = val(left(shipstr,1)) shipstr=mid(shipstr,2) if left(shipstr,1)="," then shipstr=mid(shipstr,2) end if for i = 1 to shipcount shiptot=shiptot+1 redim preserve shipdep(shiptot) as integer shipdep(shiptot) = sector next i loop shipstr=mid(shipstr,2) else 'just one sector sector = val(left(shipstr,1)) shipstr=mid(shipstr,2) for i = 1 to shipcount shiptot=shiptot+1 redim preserve shipdep(shiptot) as integer shipdep(shiptot) = sector next i end if loop
ParseShipString = shipdep end function
sub DeployCylonShips (crisisID as integer) dim shiptypes, shipdeploy as variant dim shipcount, shipid, deployflag, i, j as integer dim shipstr, logstr as string
shiptypes = Array (0, _ShipBasestar, _ShipHeavy, _ShipRaider, _ShipViper, _ShipCivilian)
for i = 1 to 5 shipstr=CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_CrisisCol + _CrisisShipCol + i - 1, _CrisisRow + crisisID).string
if shipstr <> "" then shipdeploy = ParseShipString(shipstr) shipcount=ubound(shipdeploy) ' lets see if there are enough ships deployflag=1 if shiptypes(i) = _ShipViper and UseCylonFleet then if GetAvailableShipCnt(_ShipViper) <> 0 then if GetAvailableShipCnt(_ShipMarkVII) <> 0 then 'MarkII <> 0 and MarkVII <> 0 MsgBox "There are both Mark VIIs and Mark IIs Available to deploy. Current Player chooses the distribution." deployflag = 0 elseif GetAvailableShipCnt(_ShipViper) < shipcount then ' 0 < MarkII < shipcount and MarkVII = 0 MsgBox "There are not enough Vipers to deploy. Choose which and deploy them manually." deployflag = 0 end if elseif GetAvailableShipCnt(_ShipMarkVII) = 0 then ' MarkII = 0 and MarkVII = 0 MsgBox "There are no Vipers available to deploy." elseif GetAvailableShipCnt(_ShipMarkVII) < shipcount then 'MarkII = 0 and 0 < Mark VII < shipcount MsgBox "There are not enough Vipers to deploy. Choose which and deploy them manually." deployflag = 0 else ' MarkII = 0 and MarkVII >= shipcount shiptypes(i) = _ShipMarkVII end if elseif GetAvailableShipCnt(shiptypes(i)) = 0 then if UseCylonFleet then MsgBox "There are not enough " & ShipNames(shiptypes(i)) & "s in the reserves. Deploy the remaining reserves first, then pull from the CFB, starting with the lowest-numbered CFB sector. Do not advance the Pursuit Track, do not warp in the whole Sector." else MsgBox "There are no " & ShipNames(shiptypes(i)) & "s available to deploy." end if deployflag = 0 elseif GetAvailableShipCnt(shiptypes(i)) < shipcount then 'if we have too few, that's okay if they're all going in one sector if UseCylonFleet then MsgBox "There are not enough " & ShipNames(shiptypes(i)) & "s in the reserves. Deploy the remaining reserves first, then pull from the CFB, starting with the lowest-numbered CFB sector. Do not advance the Pursuit Track, do not warp in the whole Sector." deployflag = 0 else for j = 2 to shipcount if shipdeploy(j) <> shipdeploy(1) then deployflag=0 end if next j if deployflag = 1 then shipcount = GetAvailableShipCnt(shiptypes(i)) MsgBox "There are not enough " & ShipNames(shiptypes(i)) & "s to deploy. Only " & shipcount & " are available." else 'not enough of this kind of ship MsgBox "There are not enough " & ShipNames(shiptypes(i)) & "s to deploy. Choose which and deploy them manually." deployflag=0 end if end if end if
if deployflag = 1 then for j = 1 to shipcount shipID = GetAvailableShip(shiptypes(i)) LogThis GetShipName(shiptypes(i), shipID) & " deployed in Sector " & shipdeploy(j) SetShipStatus shiptypes(i), shipID, shipdeploy(j) next j MsgBox shipcount & " " & ShipNames(shiptypes(i)) & iif(shipcount>1,"s","") & " deployed" end if end if next i
end sub 'DeployCylonShips
function GetBuryCnt (deckID as integer) as integer GetBuryCnt = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_BuryCntCol + deckID, _BuryCntRow).value end function

if reset then newval = 0 else newval = GetBuryCnt(deckID) + 1 end if CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_BuryCntCol + deckID , _BuryCntRow).value = newval end sub

GetCrisisSheet if jumpflag then CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_CrisisFlagJumpCol, _CrisisFlagRow).string = newval else CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_CrisisFlagActiveCol, _CrisisFlagRow).string = newval end if end sub

sub PlayCrisisCard dim rtncd, crisisID, toryID as integer dim crisisname as string dim refrow, refcol as integer
GetCrisisSheet GetSF
if OnNewCaprica() then refrow = _CapricaRow refcol = _CapricaCol crisisID = TopofCapricaDeck() else refrow = _CrisisRow refcol = _CrisisCol crisisID = TopofCrisisDeck() end if
if LeePlayedXO then rtncd = MsgBox("Did you remember to activate Lee's Forward Thinker?", 4) if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if end if
if CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_MissionFlagCol, _MissionFlagRow).string = "X" then rtncd = MsgBox("A Mission was played on this turn. Are you sure you want to play a Crisis card?", 4) if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if end if
if GetPlayerLoc(GetCurrentPlayer()) = "Brig" then MsgBox "Current Player (" & GetPlayerName(GetCurrentPlayer()) & ") is in the Brig, no crisis can be played." exit sub end if
rtncd = MsgBox ("Play """ & CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol, refrow + crisisID).string & """?",4) if rtncd <> 6 or Not CheckSpecialAbility() then exit sub end if
crisisname = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol, refrow + crisisID).string
CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol+1, refrow + crisisID).string = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol, refrow + crisisID).string CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol+1, refrow + crisisID).CharColor = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol, refrow + crisisID).CharColor CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol, refrow + crisisID).string = ""
if GetPlayerName(GetCurrentPlayer()) = "Tory" and NOT IsRevealed(GetCurrentPlayer()) and GetCrisisType(crisisID) = _CrisisTypeCP then MsgBox("Tory is Amoral and does not get to choose.") end if
SetCrisisStartButton(CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_CrisisValueCol, refrow + crisisID).string, GetCrisisType(crisisID)) SetCrisisFlag TRUE, CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_CrisisJumpCol, refrow + crisisID).string SetCrisisFlag FALSE, CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_CrisisActivateCol, refrow + crisisID).string
LogThis "CRISIS: " & CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol+1, refrow + crisisID).string end sub 'PlayCrisisCard
sub DiscardCurrentMission dim refrow, refcol, crisisID as integer
GetCrisisSheet
refrow = _MissionRow refcol = _MissionDiscardCol crisisID = TopofMissionDeck() - 1 if crisisID = 0 then exit sub end if
if CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_MissionStatusCol, refrow + crisisID).string = "Passed" _ or CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_MissionDistanceCol, refrow + crisisID).string = "" then CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol, refrow + crisisID).string = "X" else CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_MissionStatusCol, refrow + crisisID).string = "" CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_MissionCol, refrow + crisisID).string = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_MissionCol+1, refrow + crisisID).string CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_MissionCol, refrow + crisisID).CharColor = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_MissionCol+1, refrow + crisisID).CharColor CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_MissionCol+1, refrow + crisisID).string = "" ShuffleMissionDeck FALSE msgbox "Since last Mission played had a distance marker and it failed, Mission deck was reshuffled" end if SetMissionBtns TRUE end sub
sub PlayMissionCard dim rtncd, crisisID, skillid, refcol, refrow, difficulty, partial as integer dim skillsincheck(5), crisisName as string ' Why can't we use _SkillIDBaseMax here? dim consequence as boolean
GetCrisisSheet
refrow = _MissionRow refcol = _MissionCol crisisID = TopofMissionDeck()
crisisName = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol, refrow + crisisID).string
if crisisName = "" then MsgBox("You already played all of the missions") SetMissionBtns FALSE exit sub end if
rtncd = MsgBox ("Play Mission """ & crisisName & """?",4) if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if
CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_MissionFlagCol, _MissionFlagRow).string = "X" CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol+1, refrow + crisisID).string = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol, refrow + crisisID).string CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol+1, refrow + crisisID).CharColor = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol, refrow + crisisID).CharColor CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol, refrow + crisisID).string = ""
LogThis "MISSION: " & CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol+1, refrow + crisisID).string
' this is called to initialize a skill check for the crisis on the top of the discard pile, as it were
if CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_MissionValueCol, refrow + crisisID).string <> "" then
for skillid = _SkillIDMin to _SkillIDBaseMax skillsincheck(skillid) = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_MissionSkillCol + skillID, refrow + crisisID).string next skillid
difficulty = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_MissionValueCol, refrow + crisisID).string partial = 0 consequence = False
' set up the skill check StartSkillCheck(crisisname, skillsincheck, difficulty, FALSE, partial, consequence, "Mission") 'elseif crisisname = "Legendary Discovery" or crisisname = "The Road Less Traveled" then ' EnableSpecialDistance(crisisname) 'end if MsgBox "Skill Check Initialized" LogThis crisisName & ": Skill Check Initialized" end if
SetMissionBtns FALSE SetMissionResultBtns TRUE SetCrisisBtns FALSE end sub 'PlayMissionCard
sub MissionPass dim rtncd, crisisID, playerID, refrow, refcol, basestarID, centurionID, heavyID as integer dim crisisName as string
SetMissionResultBtns FALSE
GetCrisisSheet
refrow = _MissionRow refcol = _MissionActiveCol crisisID = TopofMissionDeck() - 1 crisisName = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol, refrow + crisisID).string
rtncd = MsgBox ("Do you want to trigger the PASS effect of Mission """ & crisisName & """?",4) if rtncd <> 6 then SetMissionResultBtns TRUE exit sub end if
LogThis "Mission " & crisisName & " PASSES." if crisisName = "Rescue Hera" then for playerID = 1 to playercnt() if OPGUsed(playerID) then SetOPG (playerID, 1) LogThis GetPlayerName(playerID) & " gains a Miracle Token!" end if next playerID elseif crisisName = "Cylon Civil War" then SetDRBBAllegiance("Human") LogThis "Rebel Basestar Allegiance now HUMAN" MsgBox("Rebel Basestar Allegiance now HUMAN") elseif crisisName = "Needs of the People" then IncreaseResource _ResourceFood IncreaseResource _ResourceFood MsgBox("+2 Food") MsgBox("Remember to repair 1 damaged Location") elseif crisisName = "Destroy the Hub" then Board_SetSpecial "Hub Destroyed" LogThis "Hub Destroyed" MsgBox("Hub Destroyed") elseif crisisName = "Attack on the Colony" then SweepShips(_ShipBasestar, FALSE) basestarID = GetAvailableShip(_ShipBasestar) if basestarID = 0 then MsgBox("No basestars off board. Please select one and remove it manually") else SetShipStatus _ShipBasestar, basestarID, _ShipStatusRemoved MsgBox("One Basestar removed from the game") LogThis "Basestar Removed from the game" end if elseif crisisName = "The Red Stripes" then SweepShips(_ShipHeavy, FALSE) SweepShips(_ShipCenturion, FALSE) centurionID = GetAvailableShip(_ShipCenturion) SetShipStatus _ShipCenturion, centurionID, _ShipStatusDestroyed centurionID = GetAvailableShip(_ShipCenturion) SetShipStatus _ShipCenturion, centurionID, _ShipStatusDestroyed LogThis "2 Centurions removed from the Game" heavyID = GetAvailableShip(_ShipHeavy) if heavyID = 0 then MsgBox("No Heavy Raiders off board. Please remove TWO manually") else SetShipStatus _ShipHeavy, heavyID, _ShipStatusDestroyed heavyID = GetAvailableShip(_ShipHeavy) if heavyID = 0 then MsgBox("Only one Heavy Raider off board. Please remove another one manually") else SetShipStatus _ShipHeavy, heavyID, _ShipStatusDestroyed MsgBox("Removed two Heavy Raiders and two Centurions from the game") LogThis "2 Heavy Raiders removed from the game" end if end if elseif crisisName = "Digging Up the Past" then EnableSpecialDistance(crisisName) MsgBox("Destination enabled. Go to the Destination tab and select the destination") LogThis "Digging Up the Past destination enabled" elseif crisisName = "The Search for Home" then EnableSpecialDistance(crisisName) MsgBox("Destination enabled. Go to the Destination tab and select the destination") LogThis "The Search for Home destination enabled" end if ' We don't reset our next mission until the next jump SetMissionBtns FALSE SetCrisisBtns TRUE CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_MissionStatusCol, refrow + crisisID).string = "Passed" end sub 'MissionPass
sub MissionFail dim rtncd, crisisID, playerID, refrow, refcol, basestarID, centurionID, heavyID, shipid as integer dim crisisName as string
SetMissionResultBtns FALSE
GetCrisisSheet
refrow = _MissionRow refcol = _MissionActiveCol crisisID = TopofMissionDeck() - 1 crisisName = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol, refrow + crisisID).string
rtncd = MsgBox ("Do you want to trigger the FAIL effect of Mission """ & crisisName & """?",4) if rtncd <> 6 then SetMissionResultBtns TRUE exit sub end if
LogThis "Mission " & crisisName & " FAILS." if crisisName = "Rescue Hera" then ReduceResource _ResourceMorale shipid=GetAvailableShip(_ShipRaptor) if shipid=0 then MsgBox "No Raptors to destroy" else SetShipStatus _ShipRaptor, shipID, _ShipStatusDestroyed MsgBox "Raptor destroyed." end if MsgBox "-1 Morale " elseif crisisName = "Cylon Civil War" then SetDRBBAllegiance("Cylon") LogThis "Rebel Basestar Allegiance now CYLON" MsgBox("Rebel Basestar Allegiance now CYLON") elseif crisisName = "Needs of the People" then ReduceResource _ResourceFood MsgBox("-1 Food. Remember to give 1 Treachery to each Human Player") elseif crisisName = "Destroy the Hub" then ReduceResource _ResourcePopulation SweepShips(_ShipViper, FALSE) SweepShips(_ShipMarkVII, FALSE) SweepShips(_ShipAssaultRaptor, FALSE) MsgBox("Vipers removed from the game board. Go to the Ships tab and damage 2 of them.") elseif crisisName = "Attack on the Colony" then basestarID = GetAvailableShip(_ShipBasestar) if basestarID = 0 then MsgBox("No basestars off board. Go to the Game State tab and damage Galactica.") else SetShipStatus _ShipBasestar, basestarID, 1 MsgBox("A basestar was placed on sector 1. Go to the Game State tab and damage Galactica.") end if elseif crisisName = "The Red Stripes" then heavyID = GetAvailableShip(_ShipHeavy) if heavyID = 0 then MsgBox("No Heavy Raiders available") else MsgBox("Placed 1 Heavy Raider in front of Galactica") SetShipStatus _ShipHeavy, heavyID, 1 end if
centurionID = GetAvailableShip(_ShipCenturion) if centurionID = 0 then MsgBox("No Centurions available") else SetShipStatus _ShipCenturion, centurionID, 1 MsgBox("Placed 1 Centurion on the Boarding Party Track") end if elseif crisisName = "Digging Up the Past" then MsgBox("You have to manually shuffle 2 Treachery Cards into the Destiny") elseif crisisName = "The Search for Home" then ReduceResource _ResourceFuel MsgBox("-1 Fuel") end if ' We don't reset our next mission until the next jump SetMissionBtns FALSE SetCrisisBtns TRUE CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_MissionStatusCol, refrow + crisisID).string = "Failed" end sub 'MissionPass
sub ActivateCrisis ' this is called to initialize a skill check for the crisis on the top of the discard pile, as it were dim crisisID, skillid, refcol, refrow, difficulty, partial as integer dim skillsincheck(5), crisisName as string ' Why can't we use _SkillIDBaseMax here? dim consequence as boolean GetCrisisSheet
if OnNewCaprica() then crisisID = TopOfCapricaDeck() - 1 refcol = _CapricaCol + 1 refrow = _CapricaRow else crisisID = TopOfCrisisDeck() - 1 refcol = _CrisisCol + 1 refrow = _CrisisRow end if
crisisname = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(refcol, refrow + crisisID).string
if GetCrisisType(crisisID) = _CrisisTypeAttack then if crisisname = "Thirty-Three" then EnableThirtyThree TRUE elseif crisisname = "Scar" then Scar end if DeployCylonShips crisisID Board_SetSpecial crisisName LogThis crisisName & ": ships deployed" end if
if CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_CrisisValueCol, refrow + crisisID).string <> "" then ' rtncd = MsgBox("Initiate the skill check for """ & CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_CrisisCol+1, _CrisisRow + crisisID).string & """?",4) ' if rtncd <> 6 then ' exit sub ' end if
for skillid = _SkillIDMin to _SkillIDBaseMax skillsincheck(skillid) = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_CrisisSkillCol + skillID, refrow + crisisID).string next skillid
difficulty = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_CrisisValueCol, refrow + crisisID).string if CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_CrisisValueCol+1, refrow + crisisID).string = "" then partial = 0 else partial = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_CrisisValueCol+1, refrow + crisisID).string end if consequence = CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_CrisisValueCol + 2, refrow + crisisID).string <> ""
' set up the skill check StartSkillCheck(crisisname, skillsincheck, difficulty, FALSE, partial, consequence, "Crisis") if crisisname = "Detector Sabotage" then MsgBox "If the crisis check fails, be sure to hit the ""Sabotage Detector"" button at the top!" CrisisForm.getByName("btnDetector").enabled = TRUE elseif crisisname = "Legendary Discovery" or crisisname = "The Road Less Traveled" then EnableSpecialDistance(crisisname) end if MsgBox "Skill Check Initialized" LogThis crisisName & ": Skill Check Initialized" end if
